title: How to Draw a Sailboat

steps.headline: Sketch the cabin section of the boat.
Sketch the waves created by the sailboat
Draw the outline over the sketch and erase the sketch marks.

tyn: Coloring tool(s) of your choice (if you'll be adding color to your picture)
text: Sketch the sailboat's hull first.  Sketch the cabin section of the boat.  Sketch the mast part.  Sketch the sails.  Sketch the waves created by the sailboat  Draw the outline over the sketch and erase the sketch marks.  Add color.
sentences: Sketch the cabin section of the boat.
Sketch the waves created by the sailboat  Draw the outline over the sketch and erase the sketch marks.
